description.title: About
description: Hello there! My name is Rohit and I'm a Frontend Developer. I started my journey as a self-taught web developer right from my school days. Ever since I have fallen in love with web development and spend most of my days taking my craft to the next level. In my free time, one can find me trying out puzzles and solving the Rubik's cube!

description.title: Web Development
description: About 2 years of experience in design, development, analysis and testing of Web based applications. Hands on experience with web development technologies like ReactJS, VueJS, Bootstrap, etc. Good knowledge of global state management libraries like Redux and Vuex

description.title: Mobile Development
description: Mobile Application Developer with experience in software development lifecycle (SDLC) including analysis, design, development, and testing, deployment. Hands on experience in developing applications for multiple domains including business, e-commerce, etc.
Proficient with React Native and Flutter in developing web and mobile hybrid applications.

description.title: Blockchain Development
description: Avid researcher of the Blockchain Technology. Experience in developing decentralized blockchain applications using Ethereum, Solana and Tezos.
Hands on experience in developing smart contracts with Ethereum and Solana.
tags: Ethereum (Solidity, Truffle, geth, Ganache, EVM, Remix IDE)

steps.title: Work TimeLine
steps.description: Timeline of projects I have previously worked on

data.label: Twitter clone on Solana blockchain
data.description: Currently developing a clone of Twitter on the Solana blockchain using one of its framework Anchor. Front end for the application developed using VueJS

data.label: Decentralized application simulating a Bank on Ethereum blockchain
data.description: Decentralized finance web app built using Solidity programming language, Truffle, and Web3.js

data.label: Interactive Custom Pizza Builder Web App built with ReactJS
data.description: Single page web app named PIZZOFY! (custom pizza builder) Using ReactJS and Redux. Deployment done using Firebase.
